text: Kurt Koski (February 7, 1958 â€“ February 11, 2021) was an American professional wrestler, better known by his ring name Rusty Brooks. He competed in several International World Class Championship Wrestling (IWCCW), Florida Championship Wrestling (FCW) and the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA). He also appeared in the World Wrestling Federation (WWF) during the mid-1980s as a preliminary wrestler. Brooks died on February 11, 2021, aged 63. He had surgery a few weeks before. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:People from Denton, Texas Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Rusty Brooks
